description: Now with an Ending Log and other user requested features and fixes from the full version! Click support for more! But enough of that, onto more important things: You! Indeed, you! This right here is a DEMO for a fully voiced original app that stars you making life changing choices! That's right! Not some strange amalgamation of an assumption of your persona, no: You!  Adventure Book!: The Adventure Game!!:: The Choice Gamebook!!! is more than just a punctuation disaster; it's an original choose-your-story written exclusively for webOS that's voiced by a classically trained actor out of UCLA. He also writes descriptions for this application on a semi-professional level.  What does this mean? Well, aside from the fact that the author is a narcissist, it means that you get to enjoy a family-friendly, humorous adventure without having to read, while deciding how you want to affect the fantastical world cooked up within. It also means you don't have to deal with another book-poorly-converted-to-an-app application.  If you enjoyed the quirky and perilous adventures of yore, then you'll certainly enjoy the 50 plus sometimes good, sometimes great, and always over-the-top endings. Try the DEMO now and go through the first tenth of the branching paths and overarching story.  Either way, have fun and BEWARE!
